virtual void visit (Type &)=0

Detailed Description

template<class Type>
class Visitor< Type >

Visitor: class template to access information within classes (Type).

The behaviour is defined in a class derived from (one or) several Visitor<Type1>, Visitor<Type2> in the definition of visit(). The derivation is associated with one from AbstractVisitor in the derived classes. All the classes that take the place of Type must have an accpet method, with AbstractVisitor in argument.
